item.description:
We're attending the 6:45pm showing. Due to the dimly lit Digital Projection scandal, we're not going to that theatre.

We'll be in the cafe area at the top of the escalators, starting at 5:45 and heading in for 6:15 to snag good seats together.

THE FILM IS SURE TO SELL OUT, so be sure to get your tickets early.

See you there.

 

Hoping to avoid the mayhem that marked his friend's Las Vegas bachelor party, Stu opts for what he thinks will be a safe pre-wedding brunch in Thailand. Hijinks are sure to ensue.

Bradley Cooper (dreamy), Zach Galifianakis (hard to spell), Ed Helms (missing right lateral bicuspid), Ken Jeong (oh, Senor Chang!), Jeffrey Tambor (hey now), Paul Giamatti (none of the above).

 

Sure to be a riot, or your money back (not intended as a factual statement).

if you miss us, we'll meet outside the feature after the film for idle chatter and potty breaks before heading for munchies, for those inclined.
item.how_to_find_us: Most assuredly will be upstairs, so look for us clustered like pigeons around a table about an hour before the feature. With a Meetup sign.
item.why: Really?? THE HANGOVER! PART 2!! Gawd! Also a good start to the Memorial Day weekend.
item.name: The Hangover Part 2
